details:
net/mlx5e: Fix wrong calculation of header index in HW_GRO

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.6 by commit 66c6dbfc8493fc1b0192f74c12d417d911ee632b, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit f97d5c2a453e26071e3b0ec12161de57c4a237c4. For more details please see the references link.
summary: net/mlx5e: Fix wrong calculation of header index in HW_GRO
